briefdescription.para: Update the timestamps of the shader classes.

parameterdescription.para: The list of files that the shader classes depend on

simplesect.para: If dagor git repo is present and files are not locally git modified, the function will use the timestamp of the last commit for file dependencies. Otherwise, it will use the filesystem timestamp
